attributes.action: Schools break up early, allowing 2 week isolation before Christmas socialising
attributes.additional_details: This will keep family members safer when mixing at Christmas. It will help slow the spread of COVID, and stop a bigger spike after Christmas. If children (who often don’t show symptoms), can finish the school term 2 weeks before we are allowed to bubble in houses of 3.
attributes.background: Allow schools to finish early in December 2020. This will allow children to isolate for 2 weeks before mixing with vulnerable family members.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549015

MPs will debate the impact of Covid-19 on schools and exams, including the request of this debate, on Monday 7 December.

You'll be able to watch the debate live on Parliament TV at 6pm: https://parliamentlive.tv/Commons
